import { useEffect } from 'react' import './style.css' const FeaturedMovie = (props) => { return (

{`${props.movie.name}`}

{`${props.movie.vote_average} ponto${props.movie.vote_average <=1 ? '': 's'}`}

{`${props.movie.overview}`}

{`${props.movie.first_air_date}`}

) } export default FeaturedMovie
